main_definition: A colloquial term used to refer to one's own mother, or mothers in general.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Colloquial term for one's own mother.
meanings_and_examples.example: I'm going home to see my moms.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A group of mothers, typically used in informal contexts or social media handles.
meanings_and_examples.example: Check out the Moms Club on Facebook for local mom support and activities!

meanings_and_examples.definition: Used humorously to refer to all mothers collectively, often with a playful tone.
meanings_and_examples.example: Every mother deserves an award day! Cheers to all moms out there.
